code:
flowchart LR
    %% Define the main sections
    subgraph Setup [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        direction TB
        A[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream] --> B[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        B --> C[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    end
    
    subgraph Acquisition [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        direction TB
        D[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] --> E{IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode}
        E -->|Yes| H[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        E -->|No| F[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        F --> H
    end
    
    subgraph Processing [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        direction TB
        I[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic] --> J[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    end
    
    subgraph Analysis [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        direction TB
        K[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> L[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        L --> M{IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream}
        M -->|Local| N[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        M -->|HPC| O[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    end
    
    subgraph Reporting [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        direction TB
        P[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> Q[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        P --> R[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        P --> S[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    end
    
    %% Connect the sections
    Setup --> Acquisition
    Acquisition --> Processing
    Processing --> Analysis
    N --> Reporting
    O --> Reporting
    
    %% Add logo reference (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    classDef logo fill:#fff,stroke:none
    LOGOtext[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    class LOGOtext logo
    
    %% Define visual styles
    classDef configNode fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    classDef scriptNode fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    classDef decisionNode fill:#ff9,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    classDef outputNode fill:#bfb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px
    
    class B,C configNode
    class D,F,I,J,K,N,O,P scriptNode
    class E,M decisionNode
    class H,L,Q,R,S outputNode
